wikipedia_page.main: Michael Philip Christie (born 21 April 1981) is an English singer-songwriter, composer, and baritone with music group G4, along with Jonathan Ansell. During the COVID-19 pandemic, he released a song called "Stay At Home", to go with his other songs like September. He is also doing online concerts via CrowdCast named "The Mike Must Go On". He does end of show shows named "Aftershow Deflation".

response: *Mike Christie, singer and composer, was born and raised in Redhill.

The group currently consists of original members tenor Jonathan Ansell and baritone Mike Christie, with Lewis Raines joining after former low tenor Ben Thapa left in 2018, and Duncan Sandilands replacing former bass singer Nick Ashby in 2019.

While at the Guildhall School, Ansell formed the pop-opera boyband G4 with three other students Mike Christie, Tom Lowe, and Ben Thapa. Lowe later resigned as bass, replaced by Matthew Stiff. Their name, G4, stands for Guildhall 4.

As a student at Guildhall where he studied for a Postgraduate diploma in vocal training, Stiff replaced bass singer Tom Lowe to become a member of G4 which also included final year undergraduates Jonathan Ansell, Mike Christie, and Ben Thapa, who all started singing together to raise money and gain experience. In 2004 they later auditioned for the first series of The X Factor and despite placing second, signed a £1.5 million record deal with Sony-BMG. Their first album, titled G4 was released in February 2005 and achieved double-platinum status. They went on to produce two more albums: G4 and Friends and G4 Act Three with combined sales in excess of 1.5 million copies.

While completing his course at Guildhall, Thapa auditioned for the first series of The X Factor with his G4 bandmates Jon Ansell, Matt Stiff, and Mike Christie where they reached the final but lost out to Steve Brookstein. Due to their popularity on the show they were soon approached by Sony BMG, and the group released three albums.'Bit of a laugh' ended in chart success' As he had perfect pitch, Thapa's other role in G4 was ensuring that the other members were in the right key during their performances.A life on the high Cs; Three years of success with an operatic boy band has left Jonathan Ansell with a taste for success The group split in 2007. However, after a seven-year hiatus, G4 reunited for a reunion concert at the Barbican Hall, and announced their 2015 reunion tour.X Factor's class act G4 reuniting for 2015 tour Ben continued touring and recording with G4 until April 2018. Then on 19 July he announced on social media that he was leaving G4 with immediate effect to concentrate on his solo Operatic career.
* Mike Christie (ice hockey) (born 1949), American hockey player

*Mike Christie (director), British film and TV director
*Mike Christie (singer) (born 1981), baritone singer formerly with British vocal troupe G4
The singer Mike Christie began his musical career by winning a choral scholarship to the school.Review Mike Christie 10 Years On at celebrityradio.biz, accessed 12 June 2020
